Description.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, that describes the substance misuse information of a patient.

Any code from the SNOMED CT UK SubstanceMisuse subset with subset original id 6081000000134.
The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
